story.kicker_image_caption: Being President is no easy work, you guys. Photo: Reuters
story.storykicker: Maybe NOW you can sing the entire song.
story.storybody:
While you've been investing all your energy in figuring out the exact lyrics to Rihanna's popular track, Work, US President Barack Obama has already aced it.

Well, almost.

Obama, who has a reputation of being as serious about having fun as he is about his Presidential duties, has an entire YouTube channel dedicated to him and his 'singing'.

Also Read: Five times Michelle Obama made us fall in love with her

Named Barackdubs the channel features a string of hilarious and delightful lip dubs--tracks that are created by stitching pieces of more than one clips together (in this case, several of Obama's public speeches).

And after (sort of) crooning to Taylor Swift's Shake it Off and Justin Bieber's Sorry in the past, President Obama can be heard crooning to Rihanna's Work, this time around. Well, not exactly crooning because it's a lip dub, you know.

Also Read: Barack Obama draws inspiration from Hindu god, Hanuman

Yeah, he lip dubs the same catchy track you and me love but can't seem to understand (of course there's an option of Google-ing the lyrics, but where's the fun in that).

Watch it here.
story.magazinekicker: Maybe NOW you can sing the entire song.
story.shortheadline: Unlike you, Barack Obama knows all the lyrics to Rihanna's Work Work Work
